channel.title: Presentations in Ewerton de Oliveira's website
channel.itunes:subtitle: Greg Restall's publications on logic and philosophy
channel.itunes:author: Greg Restall
channel.itunes:keywords: Philosophy, Logic, mathematics, pdf, research, University, Greg Restall, Melbourne, Australia, Victoria

item.title: Modeling Player Activity in a Physical Interactive Robot Game Scenario
item.description:
Abstract: In this poster, I will present the ideas in our paper about a simple quantitative model for players interaction in robogames. Please, check out the accompanying paper.

  • Link to conference website.
  • Link to conference proceedings.
  • Download poster.
]]>

item.title: Activity recognition in a Physical Interactive RoboGame
item.description:
Abstract: In this poster, I will present the ideas in our paper about a simple model to classify player’s activity in a Physically Interactive RoboGame, using a 3-axis custom accelerometer positioned on player’s chest. Please, check out the accompanying paper.

  • Link to conference website.
  • Link to conference proceedings.
  • Download poster.
]]>
